original_text: You should have known that the Messiah had to die. Only then would he return to heaven and show how great and powerful he is.’
korean_text: 그리스도가 이런 고난을 받고 자기의 영광에 들어가야 할 것이 아니냐 하시고

sentences.original_text: that the Messiah had to die
Only then would he return to heaven
and show how great and powerful he is
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 얼마나 위대하고 강한지 보여줄 것이다
